title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 202.1 - Purpose and applicability of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 202.1 - Purpose and applicability of part

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to the Metropolitan Transportation

Authority, created pursuant to title 11 of article 5 of the Public Authorities

Law (section 1260 et seq.). The purpose of this Part is to set forth specific
requirements in connection with the format of, the preparation and maintenance
of supporting documentation for, and the monitoring of, the annual budgets and
financial plans, and the format of certain financial information in strategic
operation plans, of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority. All requirements
of this Part shall apply immediately upon the effective date of this Part, except as otherwise consented to by the Comptroller at the request of the

Metropolitan Transportation Authority upon good cause shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
